To cite the `permutations` package in publications, please use
@hankin2020.  @janusz1982 consider outer automorphisms of $S_6$ and
offer the following properties of $\phi$:

```
(12) = (12)(36)(45)
(13) = (16)(24)(35)
(14) = (13)(25)(46)
(15) = (15)(26)(34)
(16) = (14)(23)(56)
```

```{r}
f <- function(n){as.cycle(unique(c(1,n)))}

print((f(4)*f(7)*f(4)) * (f(5)*f(7)*f(5)) * (f(9)*f(7)*f(9)))

cyctopair <- function(vec){
 if(vec[1] == 1){
  return(vec[-1])
      } else {
  middle <- vec[length(vec)]
  other <- vec[-length(vec)]
  return(c(matrix(rbind(other,middle,other))))
  }
}


Reduce("*",lapply(cyctopair(c(4,8,7,2)),f))


holder <- function(p){
    p <- as.cycle(p)
    out <- rep(list(NULL),length(p))
    for(i in seq_along(p)){
        pi <- p[[i]]
        for(j in seq_along(pi)){
            out[[i]] <- c(out[[i]],cyctopair(pi[[j]]))
        }
    }
    return(out)
}   
```
